name: Luna Lovegood
info:
• 简体中文名: 卢娜·洛夫古德
  • 别名: Luna Scamander
  • 别名: 露娜·罗古德
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1981-02-13
  • 引用来源: https://harrypotter.fandom.com/wiki/Luna_Lovegood
detail: Luna attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry from 1992-1999 and was sorted into Ravenclaw House. In her fourth year, Luna joined Dumbledore's Army, an organisation taught and led by Harry Potter, of which she became an important member. She participated in the Battle of the Department of Mysteries (1996) and the Battle of the Astronomy Tower (1997), and co-led the reconstituted Dumbledore's Army when Hogwarts fell under the control of Lord Voldemort with Severus Snape as headmaster.
